target: End all forms of discrimination against all women and girls everywhere
title: Whether or not legal frameworks are in place to promote, enforce and monitor equality and non‑discrimination on the basis of sex
page_content:
Non-statistical indicator
these are the policies relevant on this indicator - CEDAW
Maputo Protocol
AU solemn Declaration on gender equality in Africa
Beijing Declaration (1995)
2015 revised constitution
New 2016 succession law
Land Law (2013)

Family policy (2005)
Labor Law (2009)
Gender Policy (2010)
